item.description:
J'adore le Vent du Nord, donc allons-y les voir et écouter en plein air! On va se retrouver près de la fontaine. N'arrivez-pas en retard!

De http://www.prescottpark.org/wednight.cfm:

THE RIVER HOUSE RESTAURANT CONCERT SERIES
Held in Prescott Park each Wednesday night, you'll find some top-notch and riveting performers from around the globe. All offered in a gorgerous setting for a mere suggested $8-10 donation.
All concerts start at 7:00 pm.

LE VENT DU NORD is Canada's TOP multi-instrumental traditional band. These guys will have you dancing to the sound of fiddle and hurdy-gurdy, using an original repertoire and music that is fresh and bound to tradition. Hailing from Quebec, their strength is a sage presence that is energetic, dynamic, generous and in touch with the audience. This year, they won a JUNO Award (Canada's Grammy), on top of Album of the Year at the Canadian Folk Music Awards.

Bring a picnic blanket, snacks, etc.

Ecoutez des extraits de la musique sur son site: LE VENT DU NORD
item.how_to_find_us: On devra se rejoindre quelque part, je crois ... à préciser!

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Concert en plein air: Le Vent du Nord!
